name: MLHandActionClassifier.ModelParameters
desc: A set of parameters that affect the training process of a hand action classifier task.

items.name: init(validation: MLHandActionClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData, batchSize: Int, maximumIterations: Int, predictionWindowSize: Int, augmentationOptions: MLHandActionClassifier.VideoAugmentationOptions, algorithm: MLHandActionClassifier.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType, targetFrameRate: Double)
items.desc: Creates a set of training session parameters for a hand action classifier task.

items.name: var maximumIterations: Int
items.desc: The largest number of training iterations you allow the training session to use.

items.name: var batchSize: Int
items.desc: The number of videos the model training session uses for each training iteration.

items.name: var targetFrameRate: Double
items.desc: The number of video frames per second the hand action classifier model expects as its input at runtime.

items.name: var predictionWindowSize: Int
items.desc: The number of video frames the model training session uses to train a hand action classifier.

items.name: var algorithm: MLHandActionClassifier.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType
items.desc: The algorithm the training session uses to create the hand action classifier.

items.name: var augmentationOptions: MLHandActionClassifier.VideoAugmentationOptions
items.desc: The variations the training session uses to add more variety to its training dataset.

items.name: var validation: MLHandActionClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData
items.desc: A dataset the hand action classifier task uses to evaluate the model that’s distinct from the training dataset.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the hand action parameters.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the hand action parameters suitable for debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the hand action parameters that’s viewable in a playground.

items.name: struct MLHandActionClassifier.VideoAugmentationOptions
items.desc: Options a hand action classification training session can use to generate additional training data from the videos you provide.

items.name: enum MLHandActionClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData
items.desc: A dataset a hand action classifier task uses to validate the model during a training session.

items.name: enum MLHandActionClassifier.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType
items.desc: The hand action classifier training algorithm options.
